-  MPMovieTimeOption.nearestKeyFrame 

Case# MPMovieTimeOption.nearestKeyFrame

iOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatediPadOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1Deprecated

```
case nearestKeyFrame
```

Deprecated

Use AVPlayerViewController in AVKit

## [Discussion](/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMovieTimeOption/nearestKeyFrame#Discussion)

Generate a thumbnail image using the nearest key frame. This frame could be several frames away from the current frame. This option generally offers better performance than trying to find the exact frame.

## [See Also](/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMovieTimeOption/nearestKeyFrame#see-also)
